triplets: Edible seeds encased in a hard shell, from various trees or plants
Snacking, cooking, baking, oil extraction, and as ingredient in dishes
Shell, kernel, and sometimes salt or flavor coatings
Shell, edible kernel, and sometimes inner skin
Brown, beige, white, or reddish depending on type
Agricultural producers, nut processors, and food brands
Varies by type; almonds ~1g each, walnuts ~10g each
Shelled: months if stored properly; unshelled: up to a year
